/**
 * BlogContent Component
 *
 * Authors: Dawid Olko & Piotr SmoÅ‚a
 * Date: 2025-11-02
 * Version: 2.0
 *
 * Blog listing component displaying articles about technology and gadgets.
 * Shows grid of blog post previews with navigation to full articles.
 *
 * Features:
 *   - Grid layout of blog posts
 *   - Article previews with images
 *   - Read more links to full articles
 *   - Responsive design
 *   - Static content from data file
 *
 * Content Structure:
 *   - Each blog item includes:
 *     * Title
 *     * Excerpt/preview text
 *     * Featured image
 *     * Publication date
 *     * Author information
 *     * Category tags
 *     * Read more link
 *
 * Data Source:
 *   - BlogData.js - Array of blog post objects
 *   - Each item: {id, title, excerpt, image, date, author, category, ...}
 *
 * Navigation:
 *   - BlogItem component handles routing to /blog/:id
 *
 * @component
 * @returns {React.ReactElement} Blog posts grid section
 */import"./BlogContent.scss";import blogData from"./BlogData";import BlogItem from"./BlogItem";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{createElement as _createElement}from"react";const BlogContent=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"blog",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"blog__heading",children:"Discover the Latest in Tech and Gadgets"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog__body container",children:blogData.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_createElement(BlogItem,{...item,key:item.id}))})]});};export default BlogContent;
